infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: This app uses motion/accelerometer data to improve the experience.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Camera is used to capture images.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allows selecting photos from your library.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Allows saving images to your library.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Used to access your location while using the app.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Microphone is used for audio features.
